content: सेव्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [सेव्-ण्यत्] {@--1@} To be served or waited upon. {@--2@} To be used or employed {@--3@} To be enjoyed. {@--4@} To be taken care of or guarded. --व्यः {@--1@} A master (<ab>opp.</ab> सेवक); भयं तावत् सेव्यादभिनिविशते सेवकजनं <ls>Mu. 5. 12</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 48.</ls> {@--2@} The Aśvattha tree. --व्यं A kind of root.
